comments:
I have installed eclipse M9 gtk, cdt 2.0 m8 build and a few other plugins (emf
and uml2). When I try to open and edit a cpp/hpp file I get the message: "Unable
to instantiate editor: org.eclipse.cdt.ui.editor.CEditor
java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: org/eclipse/ui/texteditor/ExtendedTextEditor".

The exact exception is :

=====

After looking more careful at the exception.. i guess it is NOT CDT specific. In
any case here is some maybe useful info:

from
http://cudlug.cudenver.edu/eclipse/eclipse/downloads/drops/N-N20040429-200404290010/buildnotes/buildnotes_text.html
(thanks to google):
- renamed ExtendedTextEditor to AbstractDecoratedTextEditor
- renamed ExtendedTextEditorPreferenceConstants to
AbstractDecoratedTextEditorPreferenceConstants

CDT M8 will not run on Eclipse M9. There were way too many API changes. We will 
have CDT M9 ready shortly.
